name: crickish
description:
CRICKISH, A GAME ABOUT CRICKET FROM MEMORY

Google drive link if the .exe file fails - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zwI-cCVN48dgm5-xxipbykAecIcWjJIf?usp=sharing

It's the annual Crickish World Cup and Saint-Marcellin's team needs your help! As the rising star of the tournament, all eyes are on you so you'll have to keep your cool, avoid the enemy team and score points to win.

HOW TO PLAY

1-5 keys- emotes
WASD - moves character
E - picks up item
P - menu
mouse - changes camera view
space - jump
